title: When to say the Dua for knowledge & provision? (Morning & Evening Athkaar) | Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: muhammad from the u.s i wanted to know the dua for knowledge and provision that it is so so what is the prescribed time and how many times we should recite it okay i will answer inshallah muhammad from the u.s says there is a dua where for beneficial knowledge for uh wide and prosperous or plenty of provision and deeds that are accepted by you he said when do we say this this is part of the morning atkar so after you pray fajr you say this once in sha allah
